product_name: Yaktrax XTR Extreme Outdoor Traction Devices
long_description: The Yaktrax XTR Extreme Outdoor traction devices take winter traction to the next level, with stainless-steel spikes that provide powerful bite into even the iciest terrain. Durable rubber straps adapt to most footwear, securing quickly for lightweight, flexible traction on the go. Stainless-steel spikes offer reliable, confidence-boosting traction on snow and ice; plus, they resist rust and abrasion. Manganese steel plates underfoot prevent snow buildup. Yaktrax XTR Extreme Outdoor tracation devices can be worn in temperatures as low as -41degF. Comes with a heavy duty nylon bag for storage.
short_description: The Yaktrax XTR Extreme Outdoor traction devices take winter traction to the next level, with stainless-steel spikes that provide powerful bite into even the iciest terrain.
